column1: The word midget has a history of association with the [1] [1] as little people were often employed by acts in the circus, vaudeville, etc.

In anthropology, [1] [1] are ethnic groups whose average height is unusually short. The term [2] is used to describe the [3] of endemic short stature (as opposed to disproportionate dwarfism occurring in isolated cases in a population) for populations in which adult men are on average less than [4] cm (4 ft 11 in) tall.
